text:
Both mod_usertrak.mak and htpasswd.mak (perhaps others) have statements making
debug .res files (instead of to $INTDIR) when the $(LONG) is "Release" -- and
vice versa.

When fixed, building proceeds.

See also http://smithii.com/files/httpd-2.2.3-win32-src.patch which appears to
be related.
creator: apache@keithtyler.com

text: These should all have been fixed a number of revs ago.  Check the 2.2.11 package with any remaining concerns.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
